addons.title: Harder Reality
addons.description: This addon makes your game more difficult
addons.creator: Blayy

addons.title: Block Finders
addons.description: This addon adds items capable of locating literally any block in the game, including custom blocks from addons. The way the item works is very objective and easy, even showing how far the blocks found are from the central point.
addons.creator: Blayy

addons.title: Fantastic Builder Wand
addons.description: This addon adds a building wand that will help you build in survival mode
addons.creator: Blayy

addons.title: Darkness Expansion
addons.description: This addon adds creatures and items with the theme of darkness.All items that are not obtained in the crafting table are dropped from mobs. most mobs spawn in the negative layers, but Blizzard only spawns in the dark dungeon.
addons.creator: Blayy

addons.title: Level Statistics
addons.description: This addon adds new Statistics from your game
addons.creator: Blayy

addons.title: Angel Ring
addons.description: This add-On was developed to work on version 1.20.80 of Minecraft Bedrock Edition. With these items, players will be able to enjoy the experience of flying in the game, providing new dynamics and exploration possibilities.
addons.creator: Mhquim

addons.title: Insane Buffed Mobs
addons.description: Insane Buffed mobs is an addon that adds special abilities to creatures in the game. These abilities are also applied to creatures from other addons.So far we have 20 different skills and buffs
addons.creator: Blayy

addons.title: Skilled Items Deluxe
addons.description: This addon adds items with special abilities, all items have an interesting mechanic that will contribute to your survival. All tools are enchanting and repairable, and each one has its advantages.
addons.tag: items, survival, utility, magic, tools, weapons
addons.creator: Blayy

addons.title: Minerland
addons.description: With this addon you can teleport to a dimension that has all the overworld ores in large quantities, but don't forget to be careful with the challenges.
addons.creator: Blayy

addons.title: Skilled Items
addons.description:
This addon adds items with special abilities, all items have an interesting mechanic that will contribute to your survival. All tools are enchanting and repairable, and each one has its advantages. 
aa
addons.tag: items, survival, utility, magic, tools, weapons
addons.creator: Blayy

addons.title: Smartphone Addon
addons.description: A phone that adds features never seen before in Minecraft Bedrock/Minecraft PE;Remember to activate the experiments for the addon to work perfectly! addon is in english, spanish and portuguese. THIS ADDON IS IN BETA!!!
addons.creator: Spyei

addons.title: Ultimate Stone
addons.description: # This addon adds new items to your game that uses a material made with various types of stone.
addons.tag: items, survival, utility, magic, tools, weapons
addons.creator: Blayy

addons.title: Fantastic Bags
addons.description: This addon adds a lot of bags to your game
addons.creator: Blayy

addons.title: Evolution Magic Weapons
addons.description: This addon adds weapons that can be evolved as the player attacks creatures.These weapons have 4 different abilities each, each level the weapon increases, unlocks a skill, changes texture, and increases damage.
addons.creator: Blayy

addons.title: Fantastic Additions
addons.description: This add-on adds new items with amazing utilities to your game.
addons.creator: Blayy

addons.title: Portable Furnaces
addons.description: This  Addon adds new furnaces to your game that work in a very different way. main fuel used in the furnaces is Redstone, it can give enough fuel to heat up 5 items. The redstone block can provide fuel to heat up 45 items
addons.creator: Blayy

addons.title: Prismarite Addon
addons.description: This addon expands the usefulness of netherite by creating a new template. With it, you can create armor and prismarite tools to help with your aquatic experience. With this addon you can explore several oceans and even mine underwater without any worry.
addons.tag: items, survival, utility, magic, tools, weapons
addons.creator: Blayy

addons.title: Magma Expansion
addons.description: This addon adds new items to improve your experience in nether, and gives more utility to magma cream and netherite ingot.All the items of this addon have some special utility, this makes the player have a fun experience even though the addon is simple.
addons.tag: items, survival, utility, magic, tools, weapons
addons.creator: Blayy
